name: Strange Parallel：Sele
description:
[Game description]

This is a love avg game, similar to the usual galgame. Some scenes require you to click on simple options to interact.

In the game, you will play the male protagonist "Chun Ming",

Through his perspective, he composes a love story with every "her" in parallel time and space.

【game Features】

●Feast your eyes on many exquisite CG pictures.

●Professional cv full voice dubbing, making your ears happy together.

●Original background music, immersive game enjoyment.

●Diverse stories, the complete game consists of different types of stories to satisfy all tastes.

[story Introduction]

The game consists of multiple stories. We will continue to update the story in subsequent versions.

Although the male and female protagonists of each story have the same name, they are people living different lives and having different experiences in parallel time and space.

  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Story 1: Semi-Amnesiac Girl

Chunming, a gamer who has been single for 25 years, kindly took in the amnesia girl "Qiye".

And in the process of getting along, feelings gradually developed.

But hidden behind the sweet happiness, what is her true identity?

    [/h2][/h2]
  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

(Other stories are under development, so stay tuned.)

Story 2: Development progress 80%


  • -------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------

Story 3: A long serialized story, the story of Chapter 1 has been completed and is under development...
